data.title: The National Benzole Co. The "National" Game STARTABILITY.: Near Fine Loose as Issued. (1930) Limited Edition
data.meta_description: Limited Edition - Loose as Issued. - The National Benzole Co, Ltd., Buckingham Gate, Lonfon. - 1930 - Condition: Near Fine - An original cars game played on a board with counters in the shape of cars and a cut out spinning top die all the cars and die are still untouched. The game has never been played with. The colours are bright, the National logos are all over the game and board, the board is made of thick cardboard and folds into its original envelope with the Company name on the envelope. Measures approx 31 x 60 cm. The game itself is virtually fine, the large original envelope has some dirt and handling. Being influenced by the style the date would have to be 1925-32. Very Scarce item of Oil Company/Transport "Freebie" publicity advertising ephemera. Cannot find another! - The National Benzole Co. The "National" Game STARTABILITY.
data.text:
About this Item

An original cars game played on a board with counters in the shape of cars and a cut out spinning top die all the cars and die are still untouched. The game has never been played with. The colours are bright, the National logos are all over the game and board, the board is made of thick cardboard and folds into its original envelope with the Company name on the envelope. Measures approx 31 x 60 cm. The game itself is virtually fine, the large original envelope has some dirt and handling. Being influenced by the style the date would have to be 1925-32. Very Scarce item of Oil Company/Transport "Freebie" publicity advertising ephemera. Cannot find another!. Seller Inventory # 3682

Contact seller

Report this item

We are a small, single-owner business. We have been operating on and off since 1977 and our stock is varied, leaning towards antiquarian and 19th century with the addition of original aquatint and lithographic, or woodcut engravings. Also maps and Ephemera - in fact, anything interesting on paper really. We have in stock every item we list. We do not use stock photographs, but photograph each item individually. We very rarely use "fine" or "mint" as a description, mainly due to the age and the fact that 99.9% of what we sell has been pre-owned and therefor Fine would not be a term for a book we sell despite its fine-like appearance. We always take items back unreservedly if not in the condition as described. We always try to describe fully.

Visit Seller's Storefront

Colophon Books (UK)

Terms of Sale:

We guarantee the condition of every book as it's described on the AbeBooks web sites. If you're dissatisfied with your purchase (Incorrect Book/Not as Described/Damaged) We will ALWAYS make impartial refunds:

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
